p: Table 6 shows IGESE's in vitro ferric reducing activity power of 25 μg/ml, 50 μg/ml, 75 μg/ml, and 100 μg/ml in comparison with those of corresponding doses of the standard antioxidant drug. Again, IGESE's FRAP activities were significantly ( p < 0.05, p < 0.001, p < 0.0001) dose dependent and comparable to that of Vit. C especially at 50 μg/ml, 75 μg/ml, and 100 μg/ml of IGESE ( Table 6).
